name: Hoverboard on Street with 2 finger multitouch
name_original: Hoverboard on Street with 2 finger multitouch
description:
Hoverboard on Street.
Play hoverboard with two finger. Simulator hoverboard.
Try to control hoverboard using your fingers on the screen!
Escape form the obstacles,keep coin to buy new hoverboard and break new hi score.
It is very funny!
Choose your hoverboard like that, put two fingers on his feet like to present and manage your dream!

ATTENTION! The application only simulator emulator control!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your feedback and we will do our game even better for you!
